body_html: We're now focused on hardware acceleration through the NN API on Android, and don't expect to continue supporting direct access to HVX from TensorFlow, so closing this bug as no longer relevant.
body_text: We're now focused on hardware acceleration through the NN API on Android, and don't expect to continue supporting direct access to HVX from TensorFlow, so closing this bug as no longer relevant.
body: We're now focused on hardware acceleration through the NN API on Android, and don't expect to continue supporting direct access to HVX from TensorFlow, so closing this bug as no longer relevant.
